body: This looks good to me, I would maybe just lose the opacity on the notification backgrounds. Little tough to read text if you happen to be scrolled over some at the top of the page. I had initially set a container with a white background so that I could set an opacity and ease up on the harshness of the red/green colors, but if that's a pain to implement (I believe it made some transition stuff difficult last time I tried.) just go full opacity with the colors.
